title: The Unseen Brush of Victor Jenkins

story.text: Victor Jenkins begins his week in his quiet studio, painting tranquil landscapes, when a mysterious comet streaking past his window imbues his paintings with magical properties.
Victor discovers that his paintings are now portals to the locations he has depicted. Curious, he steps through one and finds himself in the lush mountains he painted the day before.
While exploring the mountainous world, Victor encounters a group of lost hikers. Using another one of his paintings, he creates a portal back to the real world, safely escorting them home.
The news of his heroic act spreads, and Victor gains the attention of a secretive organization interested in his power. He is cautious, deciding to keep his powers under wraps.

As he delves deeper into his new abilities, Victor learns he can also step into historical paintings, witnessing history firsthand. This day, he lives a day in the Renaissance, speaking with painters of yore.
Victor uses his abilities for personal gain for the first time, helping a friend battling loneliness by bringing a painted companion to life for company.

He contemplates the implications of his powers, unsure of the moral boundaries. Victor decides to use his new gifts solely for the good of others, focusing on his art as a gateway to rescue and exploration.

ending: Victor Jenkins, with brush in hand, continued to open new worlds, both literal and metaphorical, leaving an indelible mark on all he encountered.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and true heroism is using one's gifts selflessly.
